title: Verify inline policy with dlp file profile option file is protected by MIP - sanctioned instance
custom_steps:
Create a dlp file profile with file attribute "file is pprotected by MIP"
Select Sanctioned Instance
Create an inline policy with the above dlp profile created
Upload encrypted file which should be crcked open by the dlp for label and netskope inspection
custom_expected:
Verify the encrypted file upload hits the policy configured
No error in dispatch logs
